page.title: 15CHILDRENS GAMES IN EARDISLEY
page.content: Children in our school like to{play {cricket}in the summer.They play on the school field.Cricket is an outside game for children and adults.You need a bat and a ball.Our boys get very angry if you don't play properly.We also play tag where someone is on,they have to catch the others.Stick in the mud is a sort of tag game.When you are caught you have to stand still with your feet apart until someone crawls under to free you. Most{girls}like to play with{dolls. We have Sindy dolls.They are made of plastic,about 30cms.high.You can buy lots of clothes for them as well as houses,horses,cars and pools.Boys like Action men.These are the same height but have lots of army equipment.Lego is good for boys and girls.It is different plastic shapes that fit together to make all kinds of models.
